      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Stuff the player can do.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - List of actions the player can carry out.
      lastAction - The action the player carried out in the previous turn.
      map - The map the actor is on.

    • getDisplayChar

      public char getDisplayChar()
      Displays small letter m or capital letter M depending on if the status of the actor is TALL.
      Specified by:
      getDisplayChar in interface Printable
      Overrides:
      getDisplayChar in class Actor
      Returns:
      capital letter M if the status of the actor is TALL or small letter m if the status of the player is not TALL.

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      protected IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
      Returns:
      a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon
